text: 5.5 1 Ko 6.9-10, Gal 5.19-21, Kol 3.5 Nɨbi gos nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb, binɨb bin si bɨ si gɨl, mɨdupmɨdup tɨkjakek gɨl, tap chɨn ke kuŋay yɨbɨl dun agɨl nepal okok, kɨli mɨdebal. Pen binɨb tap chɨn ke kuŋay yɨbɨl dun agɨl nepal okok, kɨli binɨb tap yepɨs sɨbog ñɨbal tek ak gɨpal. Binɨb anɨb okok mɨdupsek, Klays ayɨp God ayɨp kɨli binɨb anɨb okok kɨlop dɨl kod yenɨmil tek ma lup.
